flawed_nl_solution:
There are thirty games in the season because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=40>>40
He needs to get 120 hits on the year to average 3 hits a game because 40 x 3 = <<120=120>>120
He has 40 hits already because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He needs 80 hits in the final 10 games because 120 - 40 = <<120-40=80>>80
He needs to average 8 hits a game because 80 / 10 = <<80/10=8>>8
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
